docblock.description: Class Definition for \Altamira\JsWriter\JsWriterAbstract
This class is responsible for aggregating charting options and rendering them in JavaScript.
docblock.long-description: There is a one-to-one relationship between JsWriters and charts. JsWriters are associated with different charting libraries.

docblock.description: The chart instance this JsWriter interacts with.
docblock.long-description: Each JsWriter is responsible for a single chart.

docblock.description: Global and chart-specific options.
docblock.long-description: Stored here to make it easier to json-encode.

docblock.description: Stores files that are required to properly render the registered chart
Stores JavaScript callbacks required to render the registered chart
Registry for types that may require different rendering.
docblock.long-description: A type registered as 'default' will work for all series that don't have a series registered.

docblock.description: String name of JsWriter library.
docblock.long-description: Required when writing a new class.

docblock.description: The namespace where type classes are stored for the concrete class
A flag for whether to use labels in this JsWriter.
docblock.long-description: Doesn't matter much unless you implement Labelable

docblock.description: Constructor method.
docblock.long-description: Requires the chart to be rendered. Every chart has its own JsWriter instance.

docblock.description: JSON-encoding with some additional treatments -- anything wrapped in hashes will be treated as bare in js (not wrapped in quotes, for example) -- callbacks are introduced where they are stored after json-encoding, so that they are evaluated
Registers a callback with the JsWriter and returns a key referencing it.
docblock.long-description: Used for find/replace during JSification

docblock.description: Returns an array of files required to render the chart Includes the default files, as well as any files registered by type It's important to note that some methods in concrete classes will add additional files to this instance
Returns the options for a series
supports accessing series values by instance or title
Returns an option for a specific series.
docblock.long-description: Accepts title or instance.

docblock.description: Set a series-specific value for rendering JS
Sets a global option for JS rendering
Returns global options stored in the JsWriter instance.
docblock.long-description: Allows for variable default value.

docblock.description: Initializes the storage location using the series title as a key
This is used to differentiate jsWriters of different kinds using a string name
Returns an type that has not yet been registered.
Returns the type instance for the provided key
Allows you to set discretely infinite nesting without notices by creating an empty array for key values that don't already exist

tag.name: param
tag.description: the option array to operate against

tag.name: param
tag.description: the first any number of arguments to nest through an array, the final of which being the value to set

docblock.description: Allows you to get the value for discretely infinite nesting without notices by returning null without a warning if it doesn't exist

tag.name: param
tag.description: the first of any number of arguments to nest through an array, the final of which being the value to return

docblock.description: Responsible for generating JavaScript
This wraps makeJSArray with hooks required to form the JS
Class definition for \Altamira\JsWriter\Ability\Lineable
This interface dictates that the implementing class can control and transform options around rendering lines in a chart.
Stores line width information for series
Determines whether to show the line for a series
Determines whether to show markers for the provided series title
Sets series marker style (e.g.
docblock.long-description: diamond, point, etc)

docblock.description: Sets the size of a marker (point) for a given series
Class definition for \Altamira\JsWriter\Ability\Legendable
This interface dictates that the implementing class can control and transform options around displaying a legend
Configures the legend component of a chart
Class definition for \Altamira\JsWriter\Ability\Cursorable
This interface dictates that the implementing class can control and transform options around showing cursor actions on a chart
Determines whether we should use cursor actions on a chart
Class definition for \Altamira\JsWriter\Ability\Shadowable
This interface dictates that the implementing class can control and transform options around applying a shadow to content rendered on a chart
Sets the shadowing options on how a specific series is rendered in a chart
Class definition for \Altamira\JsWriter\Ability\Zoomable
This interface dictates that the implementing class can control and transform options around allowing zooming around the chart
Allows the user to zoom based on the 'mode' key value in the array argument passed Modes include x, y, and xy
Class definition for \Altamira\JsWriter\Ability\Labelable
This interface dictates that the implementing class can control and transform options around labeling series

tag.name: todo
tag.description: Create and implement point labeling. This might should be its own interface.

docblock.description: Activates the option for labeling the provided series
Specifies a labeling option for the provided series
Class definition for \Altamira\JsWriter\Ability\Fillable
This interface dictates that the implementing class can control and transform options around series fill (e.g.
docblock.long-description: calculus-type stuff, filling under a curve, etc)

docblock.description: Used for filling series in charts
Class definition for \Altamira\JsWriter\Ability\Griddable
This interface dictates that the implementing class can control and transform options around a background grid in a chart
Sets options relating to chart grid

tag.name: param
tag.description: these include 'on', 'backgroundColor', 'color', but vary between jsWriters

docblock.description: Class definition for \Altamira\JsWriter\Ability\Highlightable
This interface dictates that the implementing class can control and transform options around point highlighting
Determines whether to allow highlighting of points, and the highlight size in its options
Class definition for \Altamira\JsWriter\Ability\Datable
This interface dictates that the implementing class can control and transform options around handling dates within charts
Determines if a chart axis should use a date format
Class definition for \Altamira\JsWriter\JqPlot
This is the class responsible for configuring and then writing out data for a single chart using the JqPlot library.
docblock.long-description: This is automatically registered based on the library parameter passed on any chart you instantiate. Most configurations are encapsulated by either the chart or series registered with the charts.

docblock.description: Used to identify the library correlating to this class
Used to identify the type namespace for this particualr JsWriter
